name: Match Dots
description:
Connect the same dots and make closed shapes or loops to earn more points in 60 seconds! Discover unique ZEN gameplay!
Match Dots is a free puzzle game about connecting dots with addictive gameplay. The goal is to clear as many dots as you possibly can.

The gameplay is very easy and simple: connect the same color, you need to drag your finger over the dots to link them. Vertically, horizontally and diagonally link supported!
For great result you will play speedy and thinking quickly!
Step by step - dot by dot, match colors for spending time!
Tell your friends or other players about Match Dots and challenge together!
ZEN Mode will give you a minutes of ZEN contemplation.

Match Dots features:
* Math Dots is a fun stylish game for you and yours friends!
* Bonuses for long dots chain and extra time for closed shapes!
* Improve your time and get more points by using 3 different power ups.
* Spend your time calm and relaxed in ZEN mode!
* Leaderboards! Beat your friends from Facebook!
* Best time killer game!!!
* Diagonally linked dots supported!
* You have 1000 seconds for ZEN play!
* Moves Play Mode!
* Dark theme!
